Name: Niemann-Pick disease type A
Definition: A Niemann-Pick disease characterized by onset in infancy and involvement of neurological tissues that has_material_basis_in an autosomal recessive mutation of SMPD1 on chromosome 11p15.4.

Name: Niemann-Pick disease type B
Definition: A Niemann-Pick disease characterized by visceral involvement only and survival into adulthood that has_material_basis_in an autosomal recessive mutation of SMPD1 on chromosome 11p15.4.

Name: Niemann-Pick disease type C1
Definition: A Niemann-Pick disease that has_material_basis_in an autosomal recessive mutation of NPC1 on chromosome 18q11.2.

Name: Niemann-Pick disease type C2
Definition: A Niemann-Pick disease that has_material_basis_in an autosomal recessive mutation of NPC2 on chromosome 14q24.3.
